summary: Implements a Home Assistant sensor platform that periodically queries fast.com to retrieve the current download and upload speeds, storing the latest results and exposing them as sensor entities with appropriate attributes such as name, icon, state and unit of measurement. Includes a data manager for asynchronous fetching, state restoration on restart, and configurable scheduling or manual triggering of updates.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant users to automatically monitor their internet connection performance, integrate speed data into dashboards and automations, and receive alerts based on speed thresholds.
